verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3927>Lemuel,<s%> the <S%H9294>oracle<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3256>taught<s%> him.
<S%H4100>What,<s%> O my <S%H1248>son<s%>? And <S%H4100>what,<s%> O <S%H1248>son<s%> of my <S%H990>womb<s%>? And <S%H4100>what,<s%> O <S%H1248>son<s%> of my <S%H5088>vows<s%>?
Do not <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H802>women,<s%> Or your <S%H1870>ways<s%> to that which <S%H4229>destroys<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%>

It is not for <S%H4428>kings,<s%> O <S%H3927>Lemuel,<s%> It is not for <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H7941>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> Or for <S%H7336>rulers<s%> to <S%H9001>desire<s%> <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H8354>drink,<s%>

<S%H6435>Lest<s%> they <S%H8354>drink<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> what is <S%H2710>decreed,<s%> And <S%H8132>pervert<s%> the <S%H1779>rights<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>afflicted.<s%> <S%H6040><s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink<s%> to him who is perishing, And <S%H6>wine<s%> to him whose <S%H3196>life<s%> is <S%H5315>bitter.<s%>
Let him <S%H8354>drink<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> his <S%H7389>poverty,<s%> And <S%H2142>remember<s%> his <S%H5999>trouble<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> for the <S%H483>dumb,<s%> For the <S%H1779>rights<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2475>unfortunate.<s%> <S%H1121><s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously,<s%> And <S%H1777>defend<s%> the <S%H1779>rights<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%>
An <S%H2428>excellent<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H4672>find<s%>? For her <S%H4377>worth<s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H6443>jewels.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of her <S%H1167>husband<s%> <S%H982>trusts<s%> in her, And he will <S%H2637>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2637>lack<s%> of <S%H7998>gain.<s%>
She <S%H1580>does<s%> him <S%H9185>good<s%> and not <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H9132>life.<s%>
She <S%H1875>looks<s%> for <S%H6785>wool<s%> and <S%H6593>flax,<s%> And <S%H6213>works<s%> with her <S%H3709>hands<s%> in <S%H2656>delight.<s%>
She is like <S%H5503>merchant<s%> <S%H591>ships;<s%> She <S%H935>brings<s%> her <S%H3899>food<s%> from <S%H4801>afar.<s%>

She <S%H6965>rises<s%> also while it is <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> And <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2964>food<s%> to her <S%H1004>household,<s%> And <S%H2706>portions<s%> to her <S%H5291>maidens.<s%>
She <S%H2161>considers<s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%> and <S%H3947>buys<s%> it; From her <S%H6529>earnings<s%> <S%H3709><s%> she <S%H5193>plants<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>
She <S%H2296>girds<s%> <S%H4975>herself<s%> with <S%H5797>strength,<s%> And <S%H553>makes<s%> her <S%H2220>arms<s%> <S%H553>strong.<s%>
She <S%H2938>senses<s%> that her <S%H5504>gain<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> Her <S%H5216>lamp<s%> does not <S%H3518>go<s%> out at <S%H3915>night.<s%>
She <S%H7971>stretches<s%> out her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H3601>distaff,<s%> And her <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H8551>grasp<s%> the <S%H6418>spindle.<s%>
She <S%H6566>extends<s%> her <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H6041>poor;<s%> And she <S%H7971>stretches<s%> out her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H34>needy.<s%>
She is not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H7950>snow<s%> for her <S%H1004>household,<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1004>household<s%> are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8144>scarlet.<s%>
She <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H4765>coverings<s%> for herself; Her <S%H3830>clothing<s%> is <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> and <S%H713>purple.<s%>
Her <S%H1167>husband<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> When he <S%H3427>sits<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
She <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H5466>linen<s%> <S%H5466>garments<s%> and <S%H4376>sells<s%> [them,] And <S%H5414>supplies<s%> <S%H2290>belts<s%> to the <S%H9211>tradesmen.<s%>
<S%H5797>Strength<s%> and <S%H1926>dignity<s%> are her <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> And she <S%H7832>smiles<s%> at the <S%H314>future.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
She <S%H6605>opens<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> And the <S%H8451>teaching<s%> of <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is on her <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
She <S%H6822>looks<s%> <S%H6822>well<s%> to the <S%H1979>ways<s%> of her <S%H1004>household,<s%> And does not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6104>idleness.<s%>
Her <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> up and <S%H833>bless<s%> her; Her <S%H1167>husband<s%> [also,] and he <S%H1984>praises<s%> her, [saying: ]
<S%H7227>"Many<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2428>nobly,<s%> But you <S%H5927>excel<s%> them <S%H3605>all.<s%>"
<S%H2580>Charm<s%> is <S%H8267>deceitful<s%> and <S%H3308>beauty<s%> is <S%H1892>vain,<s%> [But] a <S%H802>woman<s%> who <S%H3372>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> she shall be <S%H1984>praised.<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> her the <S%H6529>product<s%> of her <S%H3027>hands,<s%> And let her <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> her in the <S%H8179>gates.<s%>
